long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your Facebook engagement to the next level with Comment Engager Pro! This Google Chrome extension is designed to maximize post exposure and boost interaction, making your Facebook activity more impactful and efficient.

ðŸ‘‰ THIS IS A PAID APP - PLEASE PURCHASE ACCESS FROM YOUR RESELLER ðŸ‘ˆ

With Content Engage AI, you can seamlessly automate replies to all comments on your personal Facebook posts. Whether you want to reply to selected keywords or engage with all comments, this tool has you covered. Our advanced system sends out randomized comments from your preset message groups, giving every response a personal touch while keeping the automation under the radar.

Key Features:

Array of Messages: Create message segments and groups to generate a rich variety of randomized comments for your audience.

Comment Engager Pro Cards: Set up individual cards for each post to automate the comment reply process with a host of customizable options.

Intelligent Keyword System: Set specific keywords for the extension to look for in comments, enabling more targeted and meaningful interactions.

Advanced Delay and Pause Settings: Control the pacing of your replies and avoid appearing too automated with minimum reply time, random delay time, and pause settings.

Latest Post Engagement: Choose to reply only to the latest comments or engage with all comments on a post.

Effortless Duplication: Copy settings from previously created cards for new posts, making the setup process quicker and smoother.

Additionally, Comment Engager Pro offers a General Post Profits Pro feature, allowing you to run the extension on each post one after another with the same setting.

Make the most out of your Facebook interactions with Comment Engager Pro - your one-stop solution for effective, automated engagement! Download now and start your journey towards increased post exposure and interaction.
